mapper.select: select t.id, t.id_user, t.address, t.receiver, t.mobile, t.isdefault as 'isDefault', t.status, t.createdate as 'createDate', t.lastdate as 'lastDate', t.provinceid as 'provinceId', (select r.name from region r where r.id = t.provinceid) as 'provinceName', t.cityid as 'cityId', (select r.name from region r where r.id = t.cityid) as 'cityName', t.countyid as 'countyId', (select r.name from region r where r.id = t.countyid) as 'countyName' from user_address t where t.id_user = #{value} and t.status = '1' order by t.isdefault desc

select t.id, t.id_user, t.address, t.receiver, t.mobile, t.isdefault as 'isDefault', t.status, t.createdate as 'createDate', t.lastdate as 'lastDate', t.provinceid as 'provinceId', t.cityid as 'cityId', t.countyid as 'countyId' from user_address t where t.id_user = #{id_user} and t.id = #{id} and t.status = '1'
mapper.insert: insert into user_address( id_user, address, receiver, mobile, isdefault, status, createdate, lastdate, provinceid, cityid, countyid )values( #{id_user}, #{address}, #{receiver}, #{mobile}, '0', '1', now(), now(), #{provinceId}, #{cityId}, #{countyId}, )
mapper.delete: delete from user_address where id_user = #{id_user} and id = #{id}
